name: Nadolol

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A CORN

contraindications: must individualized . nadolol tablets , usp may administered without regard meals .
warningsAndPrecautions: tablets blue color mottling , round , biconvex , score line one side debossed product code . nadolol tablets available following strengths : 20 mg tablets ( ndc68001-630-00 ) , 100 ’ hdpe container , debossed ‘ 020 ’ 40 mg tablets ( ndc68001-631-00 ) , 100 ’ hdpe container , debossed ‘ 021 ’ 80 mg tablets ( ndc68001-632-00 ) , 100 ’ hdpe container , debossed ‘ 022 ’
adverseReactions: nadolol contraindicated bronchial asthma , sinus bradycardia greater first degree conduction block , cardiogenic shock , overt cardiac failure ( ) .
contraindications_original: DOSAGE MUST BE INDIVIDUALIZED. NADOLOL TABLETS, USP MAY BE ADMINISTERED WITHOUT REGARD TO MEALS.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
All tablets are blue color with mottling, round, biconvex, having a score line on one side and debossed with the product code on the other.
                  Nadolol Tablets are available in the following strengths: 
  
                     20 mg tablets(
 
  NDC68001-630-00), 100’s HDPE Container, debossed ‘020’ 
  
                     40 mg tablets(
 
  NDC68001-631-00), 100’s HDPE Container, debossed ‘021’ 
  
                     80 mg tablets(
 
  NDC68001-632-00), 100’s HDPE Container, debossed ‘022’
adverseReactions_original:
Nadolol is contraindicated in bronchial asthma, sinus bradycardia and greater than first degree conduction block, cardiogenic shock, and overt cardiac failure (see
 
  WARNINGS).
